thread.section_title: Melia Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Courbevoie, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect end of year break away
thread.title_full: Perfect end of year break away - Review of Melia Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: Chris E
title: Perfect end of year break away
text:
We stayed here between christmas and new year, and we really loved it, we had a super modern room with a view on the city skyline (including the Eiffel tower).
The staff is very friendly and helpful.
Normally I use this hotel for business appointments in Paris, it was the first time I stayed here just for a romantic escape during a hectic period.
Complements to the staff !!
Room Tip: Take the tiger levels See more room tips
